name: Black Widow
tagline: A federal investigator tracks down a gold digging woman who moves from husband to husband, kills them and collects the inheritance.

name: Aliens in the Attic
tagline: A group of kids must protect their vacation home from invading aliens.

name: Don't Tell Mom the Babysitter's Dead
tagline: Five kids are left home when their mother leaves town on a three-month vacation to Australia, only to have their geriatric babysitter die of a heart attack, leading to the eldest teen, Sue Ellen, to scam her way into taking a job at a hip Los Angeles fashion company to feed and support her needy siblings.

name: Twisted
tagline: Jessica, whose father was a serial killer, is a police officer. While investigating a murder, she finds herself in the centre of her own investigation, when her former lovers start dying around her at a furious pace.

name: Fallen
tagline: Homicide detective John Hobbes witnesses the execution of serial killer Edgar Reese. Soon after the execution the killings start again, and they are very similar to Reese's style.

name: Nurse Betty
tagline: Comedy about a widow's post-traumatic obsession with a soap star.

name: Escape Plan
tagline: When a structural-security authority finds himself set up and incarcerated in the world's most secret and secure prison, he has to use his skills to escape with help from the inside.

name: The Reaping
tagline: A former Christian missionary, who specializes in debunking religious phenomena, investigates a small town which seems to be suffering from the 10 biblical plagues.

name: The Morning After
tagline: A woman wakes up next to a murdered man. Did she do it herself, and if not, is she in danger herself?

name: Moscow on the Hudson
tagline: When a Russian musician defects in Bloomingdale's department store in New York, he finds adjusting to American life more difficult than he imagined.

name: Against All Odds
tagline: A gangster hires an ex-football player to find his girlfriend. When he finds her, they fall in love, and the twists start to appear.

name: Killer Elite
tagline: When his mentor is taken captive, a retired member of Britain's Elite Special Air Service is forced into action. His mission: kill three assassins dispatched by their cunning leader.

name: Midnight in the Garden of Good and Evil
tagline: A visiting city reporter's assignment suddenly revolves around the murder trial of a local millionaire, whom he befriends.

name: Alpha and Omega
tagline: Two young wolves at opposite ends of their pack's social order are thrown together into a foreign land and need each other to return home, but love complicates everything.

name: Wyatt Earp
tagline: Wyatt Earp is a movie about a man and his family. The movie shows us the good times and the bad times of one of the West's most famous individuals.

name: The Wood
tagline: While dealing with a friend's cold feet on his wedding day, a writer reminisces about his youth with his best friends.

name: The Forbidden Kingdom
tagline: A discovery made by a kung fu obsessed American teen sends him on an adventure to China, where he joins up with a band of martial arts warriors in order to free the imprisoned Monkey King.

name: Grindhouse
tagline: Two full length feature horror movies written by Quentin Tarantino & Robert Rodriguez put together as a two film feature. Including fake movie trailers in between both movies.

name: In the Name of the Father
tagline: A man's coerced confession to an IRA bombing he did not commit results in the imprisonment of his father as well. An English lawyer fights to free them.

name: Piranha 3D
tagline: After a sudden underwater tremor sets free scores of the prehistoric man-eating fish, an unlikely group of strangers must band together to stop themselves from becoming fish food for the area's new razor-toothed residents.

name: Altered States
tagline: A Harvard scientist conducts experiments on himself with a hallucinatory drug and an isolation chamber that may be causing him to regress genetically.

name: Thunderbolt and Lightfoot
tagline: With the help of an irreverent young sidekick, a bank robber gets his old gang back together to organize a daring new heist.

name: Some Like It Hot
tagline: When two musicians witness a mob hit, they flee the state in an all female band disguised as women, but further complications set in.

name: Logan's Run
tagline: An idyllic sci-fi future has one major drawback: life must end at 30.

name: Kingpin
tagline: A star bowler whose career was prematurely "cut off" hopes to ride a new prodigy to success and riches.

name: Never Back Down
tagline: At his new high school, a rebellious teen is lured into an underground fight club, where he finds a mentor in a mixed martial arts veteran.

name: Season of the Witch
tagline: 14th-century knights transport a suspected witch to a monastery, where monks deduce her powers could be the source of the Black Plague.

name: Quiz Show
tagline: Dick Goodwin discovers game shows are fixed: Charles Van Doren is fed answers so he beats Herbie Stempel.

name: Our Idiot Brother
tagline: A comedy centered on an idealist who barges into the lives of his three sisters.

name: From Russia with Love
tagline: James Bond willingly falls into an assassination ploy involving a naive Russian beauty in order to retrieve a Soviet encryption device that was stolen by SPECTRE.

name: Thank You for Smoking
tagline: Satirical comedy follows the machinations of Big Tobacco's chief spokesman, Nick Naylor, who spins on behalf of cigarettes while trying to remain a role model for his twelve-year-old son.

name: Waking Ned Devine
tagline: When a lottery winner dies of shock, his fellow townsfolk attempt to claim the money.

name: The Craft
tagline: A newcomer to a Catholic prep high school falls in with a trio of outcast teenage girls who practice witchcraft and they all soon conjure up various spells and curses against those who even slightly anger them.

name: The Man Without a Face
tagline: Chuck wants to leave home but can't make the grade for boarding school. Then he finds out the disfigured recluse living nearby is an ex-teacher.

name: Sex, Lies, and Videotape
tagline: A sexually repressed woman's husband is having an affair with her sister. The arrival of a visitor with a rather unusual fetish changes everything.

name: Gorillas in the Mist
tagline: The story of Dian Fossey, a scientist who came to Africa to study the vanishing mountain gorillas, and later fought to protect them.

name: Lottery Ticket
tagline: Kevin Carson is a young man living in the projects who has to survive a three-day weekend after his opportunistic neighbors find out he's holding a winning lottery ticket worth $370 million.

name: Operation Dumbo Drop
tagline: To keep the loyalty of a native village during the Vietnam war, a US Army officer and his unit struggle to deliver it a live elephant.

name: FernGully: The Last Rainforest
tagline: The magical inhabitants of a rainforest called FernGully fight to save their home that is threatened by logging and a polluting force of destruction called Hexxus.

name: Fearless
tagline: This film tells the story of Chinese Martial Arts Master Huo Yuanjia (1869-1910). Huo Yuanjia was the founder and spiritual guru of the Jin Wu Sports Federation.

name: Fargo
tagline: Jerry Lundegaard's inept crime falls apart due to his and his henchmen's bungling and the persistent police work of the quite pregnant Marge Gunderson.

name: Sicko
tagline: A documentary comparing the highly profitable American health care industry to other nations, and HMO horror stories.

name: Unleashed
tagline: A man enslaved by the mob since childhood and raised into behaving like a human attack dog escapes his captors and attempts to start a new life.

name: Fly Away Home
tagline: A father and daughter decide to attempt to lead a flock of orphaned Canada Geese south by air.

name: Sling Blade
tagline: Karl Childers, a simple man hospitalized since his childhood murder of his mother and her lover, is released to start a new life in a small town.

name: Don Jon
tagline: A New Jersey guy dedicated to his family, friends, and church, develops unrealistic expectations from watching porn and works to find happiness and intimacy with his potential true love.

name: The Emerald Forest
tagline: After the son of engineer Bill Markham is abducted by an aboriginal tribe on the edge of the rain forest, the engineer spends the next 10 years searching for him.

name: The Sweetest Thing
tagline: A girl finds she is forced to educate herself on the etiquette of wooing the opposite sex when she finally meets Mr. Right.

name: Elektra
tagline: Elektra the warrior survives a near-death experience, becomes an assassin-for-hire, and tries to protect her two latest targets, a single father and his young daughter, from a group of supernatural assassins.

name: Sparkle
tagline: In the 1960s, three sisters form a girl group and soon become local sensations with major label interest, but fame becomes a challenge as the close-knit family begins to fall apart.

name: Ice Princess
tagline: With the help of her coach, her parents, and the boy who drives the Zamboni machine, nothing can stop Casey (Trachtenberg) from realizing her dream to be a champion figure skater.

name: 15 Minutes
tagline: A homicide detective and a fire marshall must stop a pair of murderers who commit videotaped crimes to become media darlings.

name: Arlington Road
tagline: A college professor begins to suspect that his neighbour is a terrorist.

name: Dolores Claiborne
tagline: A big-city reporter travels to the small town where her mother has been arrested for the murder of an elderly woman that she works for as a maid.

name: Across the Universe
tagline: The music of the Beatles and the Vietnam War form the backdrop for the romance between an upper-class American girl and a poor Liverpudlian artist.

name: Hoffa
tagline: A film based on the story of legendary union figure Jimmy Hoffa.

name: The Spy Next Door
tagline: Former CIA spy Bob Ho takes on his toughest assignment to date: looking after his girlfriend's three kids, who haven't exactly warmed to their mom's beau.

name: The People Under the Stairs
tagline: Two adults and a juvenile burglar break into a house occupied by a brother and sister and their stolen children and can't escape.

name: Dead Presidents
tagline: A Vietnam vet adjusts to life after the war while trying to support his family, but the chance of a better life may involve crime and bloodshed.

name: Hearts in Atlantis
tagline: A widowed mother and her son change when a mysterious stranger enters their lives.

name: Clerks II
tagline: A calamity at Dante and Randall's shops sends them looking for new horizons - but they ultimately settle at Mooby's, a fictional Disney-McDonald's-style fast-food empire.

name: Lord of War
tagline: An arms dealer confronts the morality of his work as he is being chased by an Interpol agent.

name: Tinker Tailor Soldier Spy
tagline: In the bleak days of the Cold War, espionage veteran George Smiley is forced from semi-retirement to uncover a Soviet agent within MI6.

name: Virtuosity
tagline: A virtual-reality serial killer manages to escape into the real world.

name: Angel Eyes
tagline: A mysterious man is drawn to a feisty female police officer and a unusual relationship ensues, as not everything is as it seems.

name: Don't Be Afraid of the Dark
tagline: A young girl sent to live with her father and his new girlfriend discovers creatures in her new home who want to claim her as one of their own.

name: The Life Aquatic with Steve Zissou
tagline: With a plan to exact revenge on a mythical shark that killed his partner, oceanographer Steve Zissou rallies a crew that includes his estranged wife, a journalist, and a man who may or may not be his son.

name: Around the World in 80 Days
tagline: A bet pits a British inventor, a Chinese thief, and a French artist on a worldwide adventure that they can circle the globe in 80 days.

name: Observe and Report
tagline: Bi-polar mall security guard Ronnie Barnhardt is called into action to stop a flasher from turning shopper's paradise into his personal peep show. But when Barnhardt can't bring the culprit to justice, a surly police detective, is recruited to close the case.

name: Corky Romano
tagline: The loser son of a Mafia honcho must go undercover for the FBI.

name: An Inconvenient Truth
tagline: A documentary on Al Gore's campaign to make the issue of global warming a recognized problem worldwide.

name: Striking Distance
tagline: Coming from a police family, Tom Hardy ends up fighting his uncle after the murder of his father. Tom believes the killer is another cop, and goes on the record with his allegations. Demoted then to river duty, the killer taunts Tom.

name: House of Wax
tagline: An associate burns down a wax museum with the owner inside, but he survives only to become vengeful and murderous.

name: Perfect Stranger
tagline: A journalist goes undercover to ferret out businessman Harrison Hill as her childhood friend's killer. Posing as one of his temps, she enters into a game of online cat-and-mouse.

name: Good Burger
tagline: Two dim-witted teenage boys, are forced to save the fast-food restaurant they work at from going out of business, despite a new-and-improved burger joint opening across the street that want to be the "Top Dog" in the fast food industry.

name: The Best Years of Our Lives
tagline: Three WWII veterans return home to small-town America to discover that they and their families have been irreparably changed.

name: The Wicker Man
tagline: A sheriff investigating the disappearance of a young girl from a small island discovers there's a larger mystery to solve among the island's secretive, neo-pagan community.

name: Hot Fuzz
tagline: Exceptional London cop Nicholas Angel is involuntarily transferred to a quaint English village and paired with a witless new partner. While on the beat, Nicholas suspects a sinister conspiracy is afoot with the residents.

name: My Blue Heaven
tagline: An all too uptight FBI agent must protect a larger than life mobster with a heart of gold, currently under witness protection in the suburbs.

name: How to Make an American Quilt
tagline: Bride-to-be Finn Dodd hears tales of romance and sorrow from her elders as they construct a quilt.

name: Born to Be Wild
tagline: This heartwarming film documents orphaned orangutans and elephants and the extraordinary people who rescue and raise them-saving endangered species one life at a time.

name: The Losers
tagline: A CIA special forces team are betrayed and left for dead by their superiors, galvanizing them to mount an offensive on the CIA.
